document: "You see, a king without compassion does not deserve a kingdom." - (Sheeta) The Castle in the Sky
"I kinda missed you guys, and it looks like it's gonna rain." (Calcifer) Howl's Moving Castle
"My sister and I are two halves of a whole, but we really don't get along." - Spirited Away
Sophie: "Even though I'm not pretty, and all I'm good at is cleaning." Howl: "Sophie! Sophie, you're beautiful." - Howl's Moving Castle
"How like a human to think of only himself." - (Moro) Princess Mononoke
"Come here, dust bunnies. Come out, come out, wherever you are!" - My Neighbour Totoro
"Airplanes are beautiful, cursed dreams, waiting for the sky to swallow them up." - The Wind Rises
"I've always liked a girl who speaks from the heart." - (The Baron) The Cat Returns
"It doesn't really matter what color your dress is. What matters is the heart inside." - Kiki's Delivery Service
"There's always tomorrow." - (Toshio) Only Yesterday
"No more killing. It has to stop." - Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
"Just follow your heart and keep smiling." - Kiki's Delivery Service

"Those are shrines. Some people believe spirits live in them." - Spirited Away
"Let us go forth together...in search of the treasure of lapis lazuli!" - Whisper of the Heart
RT @padula: 3 years ago, I took 300 screenshots from each Studio Ghibli movie I owned, to make a photo mosaic of Hayao Miyazaki http://t.co…
"I hate boys. But I really love Nanny's rice cakes!" - My Neighbour Totoro
"He's calling the spirits of darkness. I saw him do this once before when a girl dumped him." - Howl's Moving Castle
"I used to be able to fly without even thinking. Now I'm trying to look inside myself and find out how I did it." - Kiki's Delivery Service
"You're in love. Don't deny it, you've been sighing all day." - Howl's Moving Castle
"It must be great to know what you want to do. I've got no idea at all. I just go from one day to the next." - Whisper of the Heart
"I meet people, and at first everything seems to be going okay, but then I start feeling like such an outsider." - Kiki's Delivery Service
"You who swallowed a falling star, o' heartless man. Your heart shall soon be mine." - Howl's Moving Castle
Howl’s Moving Castle (2004) https://t.co/AiMJvYWTD7

“Flower, bear fruit and die; be born, grow up, and die. Still the wind blows, the rain falls, the waterwheel goes round. Lifetimes come and go in turn.” - The Tale of Princess Kaguya (Isao Takahata 1935-2018) https://t.co/UunJeOQaeW
https://t.co/4hAzzhi5zV

"The trees cry out as they die, but you cannot hear them." - Princess Mononoke
"In ancient times the land lay covered in forests, where from ages long past, dwelt the spirits of the gods." - Princess Mononoke
“Go ahead and do what your heart tells you.” - Whisper of the Heart (1995)

"Only idiots believe what they read in the paper." - Howl's Moving Castle
"Any woman is just as capable of being a hero as any man.” - Hayao Miyazaki
"Well, one nice thing about getting old is nothing frightens you." - (Sophie) Howl's Moving Castle
The Kingdom of Dreams and Madness is on Netflix! A great documentary looking into the life of Hayao Miyazaki and Studio Ghibli
"I've loved you since the wind brought you to me." -The Wind Rises
"Today, all of humanity's dreams are cursed somehow. Beautiful yet cursed dreams." - Hayao Miyazaki
"Wow! Sophie, your hair looks just like starlight." - (Howl) Howl's Moving Castle
"I believe that stories have an important role to play in the formation of human beings." - Hayao Miyazaki
We depict hatred, but it is to depict that there are more important things. We depict a curse, to depict the joy of liberation - H Miyazaki
"She likes my spark!" - (Calcifer) Howl's Moving Castle
"This life, that is both our dormant and our treasure was never meant to endure for eternity." - Tales from Earthsea
"The way you fell from the sky, I thought that maybe you were an angel or something." - Castle in the Sky

“Stop trying. Take long walks. Look at scenery. Doze off at noon. Don’t even think about flying. And then, pretty soon, you’ll be flying again.” -
(Ursula) Kiki’s Delivery Service
